# Research Slide Deck

A rolling collection of research figures organized by topic.

## Navigation

- **[Slides](slides.qmd)**: Full presentation view of all figures
- **[Recent](recent.qmd)**: Most recently added figures across all topics

## Topics

### Data Exploration

Exploratory data analysis, distributions, correlations, and data quality checks.

### Modeling

Model development, diagnostics, and intermediate results.

### Results

Final results, key findings, and publication-ready figures.

---

## CLI Commands

```bash
# Install the CLI (run once)
pip install -e .

# Add a figure with caption
slidedeck add figures/data_exploration/plot.png \
  --title "Age Distribution" \
  --caption "Distribution of participant ages (N=1,234)"

# Add with speaker notes
slidedeck add figures/modeling/coefficients.png \
  --title "Model Coefficients" \
  --caption "Standardized regression coefficients with 95% CI" \
  --notes "Note the large effect of education variable"

# Build/regenerate all QMD files
slidedeck build

# Preview the slides
slidedeck preview
```
